summary:
Noble Clothes for my female No-Armor Warrior. Enchantable. Female only.
(Mining Clothes Variant almost complete Retexture and Higher Resolution 1024px²)
descriptionHtml:
Noble Clothes for my female No-Armor Warrior. Enchantable. Female only.
(Mining Clothes Variant almost complete Retexture and Higher Resolution 1024px²)

It overrides one of the possible female Miner Outfit Variants. Will change it probably when Modkit is out.


There are 2 Files, 1 for wearing with boots (No ankles cause of Alpha and Mesh Collision)
and now an optional file for more variety in shoes without any alpha at the legs.

Installation:

Unzip the archive to your Skyrim\\Data folder.

Uninstallation:

Delete Data\\textures\\clothes\\minerclothes\\variant\\Minerclothesf.dds

ID is 0006FF43 when you try to obtain it through console. Otherwise you can find it at the Tailor Shop in Solitude.



Have Fun with it!

:)
author: Karmoth
